name: Pirates in Time and Space
description:
A hole in time has appeared in the middle of the ocean and aliens from the future broke through into our time!

Then pirates attacked and plundered them of all their future tech, used that tech to turn their ships into space ships and flew off into the future to plunder your great grandchildren.

Save the poor little aliens adrift on the ocean to allow you to break through the portal and defeat the evil space pirates!

Created for both the Kenney Jam 2018 and The Very First Extra Credits Game Design Jam.
